p: In general, PQR has good biological activity and has developed a variety of products in health care medicine, health food, health cosmetics and other industrial fields. It is a valuable edible and medicinal resource worthy of attention. PQR has changed from medicinal plant to medicine and food homologous product, which has expanded consumer groups. The positive development of health care industry can also promote the development of health industry and traditional Chinese medicine in the new era. Consumers also hope that they can enhance their health, improve their physical functions and even prevent diseases through the use of health food. Further development of health products of PQR will undoubtedly be the focus of future research. However, the available health-related data on PQR are insufficient, and its clinical health value needs to be further verified.
